description:
After a chance encounter, Ten becomes obsessed with the alien superhero known as Super Delicious Planet Golden Special Reserve Gorgeous Aftercare Kit #28. However, the kid`s new hero isn`t as glamorous as his name makes him out to be.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le super héros de la justice
Man or Bird? Gokakenran, Champion of Justice!
人か鳥か? 豪華けんらん正義の味方!
